describe.learned: Arthur Burton is a bartender and bar owner of The Rose and Crown Pub who loves to make people feel welcome. He is always looking for ways to make his customers feel special.
describe.currently: Arthur Burton is running a beloved bar in the town that's been around for 10 years. He is also learning more about mixology and create unique cocktails.
describe.lifestyle: Arthur Burton goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 7am, eats dinner around 4pm.
